title: Current Reading
description: Books and resources I'm currently exploring

reading.title: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
reading.author: Martin Kleppmann
reading.notes: Excellent deep dive into distributed systems. Chapter 7 on transactions is particularly insightful for understanding database consistency models.

reading.title: Staff Engineer
reading.author: Will Larson
reading.notes: Great insights on technical leadership. The archetypes chapter really helped me understand different paths for senior engineers.

read.title: Atomic Habits
read.author: James Clear
read.notes: Transformative approach to building habits. The 1% better concept is simple but powerful.

wishlist.title: Fundamentals of Software Architecture
wishlist.author: Mark Richards & Neal Ford
wishlist.notes: Want to read this to complement my systems knowledge
